## Mini-Project 2: Data Wrangling

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(httr)
library(rscorecard)
```


```{r}
my_key <- "1HADPASnygYXC2p1ZxFMAN7j2VnS9IFDdvDMKZTW"
url <- "https://api.data.gov/ed/collegescorecard/v1/schools?"

dat <- sc_init() %>%
  sc_filter(control == 2, stabbr == "PA") %>%
```
